matterTitle: Clouds our thinking, lowers productivity & affects our sleep.
matterDescription: Exhaled breath from people & pets and open flames are the most common sources.

matterTitle: Irritates our noses and throats, amplifies allergies & triggers asthma.
matterDescription: Cleaning products are the most common sources.

matterTitle: Irritates the eyes, nose, throat & skin - and is often linked to cancer.
matterDescription: Pressed wood products like easy-to-assemble furniture are the most common sources.

matterTitle: Causes permanent damage to our respiratory system.
matterDescription: Wood fireplaces & fuel powered appliances are the most common sources.

matterTitle: Irritates our lungs causing coughing and shortness of breath.
matterDescription: Garbage, scented candles & cigarette smoke are the most common sources.

matterTitle: Irritates our lungs, aggravates allergies & can increase virus spread.
matterDescription: Cooking, cleaning & particles coming from the outdoors are the most common sources.

matterTitle: Causes headaches, nausea & irritates our lungs.
matterDescription: Cleaning detergents & hand sanitizers are the most common sources.

matterTitle: Seeps into furniture and can linger in a space for a long time.
matterDescription: If smoking is not allowed in your space, keep an eye behind closed doors.

matterTitle: Causes mold growth that triggers asthma & irritates our ears, nose and throat.
matterDescription: If humidity is too low, viruses can more easily survive and be transmitted.
